about.title: About Me

kersta.title: CEO/Co-Founder Kersta GmbH
kersta.description: Founding and building a technology startup. We develop innovative AI solutions for companies.

teamlead.title: Team Lead Technology
teamlead.description: In 2023, my colleague and I took over the leadership of the Technology Department of the Digital Learning Team at Aalen University. In this role, we are responsible for the digitization of teaching. We evaluate new tools and implement them as needed. To advance the digitization of teaching, we also develop our own solutions. Additionally, we provide support for students and lecturers in using the Canvas learning platform and assist startups and companies in developing prototypes.

projects.title: Chatbot
projects.description: To provide students with ChatGPT, we developed an application that integrates a ChatGPT-based chatbot into the Canvas learning platform. Students can interact with the chatbot directly in Canvas. I supervised this project as a Senior Developer and implemented it together with two other developers. Data privacy was a central issue. Backend: Python (FastAPI), PostgreSQL, Redis (Caching). Load Balancer for high availability. Deployment: Docker. Frontend: Vue (LTI 1.3). This project serves as the foundation for a statewide university chatbot.

projects.title: Semester Transition
projects.description: To facilitate the semester change for lecturers, we developed an application that copies courses from the last semester to the new semester and links them to the lecture schedule. For this, we developed an interface to the IT department's timetable tool. The application is continuously maintained and adapted to API changes.

bachelor_thesis.title: Prototype Development of a Robot Arm - Bachelor Thesis
bachelor_thesis.description: The goal of the thesis was to develop a prototype of a robot arm for medical applications. This included design, construction, and firmware development. The arm was manufactured using purchased parts (Nema 17 motors, 1:100 planetary gears) and 3D printed parts (FDM and MSLA). TMC5160 drivers were used, controlled by an ESP32 via SPI. The firmware (C++, ESP-IDF) calculates joint positions using inverse kinematics. Grade: 1.0.

projects.title: Feasibility Analysis & Customer Communication
projects.description: Finding solutions together with the customer, visualizing ideas through simplified 3D models.

projects.title: 3D Modeling & Rapid Prototyping
projects.description: Design in Autodesk Fusion 360. Use of FFF and MSLA 3D printing to evaluate different processes.

projects.title: Electronics & Control
projects.description: Development of electronics and firmware from scratch, including implementation of inverse kinematics.

consultant.title: Technology Consultant
consultant.description: During the COVID-19 pandemic, I initially worked at the university's test center. Since the documentation was monotonous, I proactively developed a software solution for automation. As a result, I was offered the position of Technology Consultant. Since then, I have been developing and implementing various software solutions for the university.

projects.title: Test Center Software
projects.description: Web application where users could register. Testers received instructions based on the test kit used and only had to enter the result. Certificates were automatically created and sent via email.

projects.title: LMS Admin Panel
projects.description: Development of an admin panel for Canvas to provide missing administrative functions, such as creating temporary user accounts.

mahle.title: Intern - Corporate Research
mahle.description: 6-month internship in advance development at MAHLE. I worked on a project to develop a control system for a novel thermal actuator.

projects.title: Control System & Software
projects.description: Implementation of software control for a hardware controller and integration into the overall system.

projects.title: Testing
projects.description: Conducting functional tests in the laboratory and developing automated software tests for the overall system.

projects.title: Research
projects.description: Research and prototypical implementation in the context of a new software framework.

master.title: Master of Science - Machine Learning and Data Analytics

projects.title: Digital Signal Processing and Machine Learning

scholarship.title: Scholarship
scholarship.description: In 2022, I was nominated for a scholarship by my professor. I was accepted due to my outstanding academic performance and social commitment.

projects.title: Fire Department
projects.description: Before my studies, I was an active member of the volunteer fire department in Wiesbaden and supported the youth fire department as an instructor.

projects.title: Youth Forum
projects.description: Member of the Aalen Youth Forum since 2021. Representing the interests of young people in local politics. Projects: Expansion of public transport and bike paths in cooperation with local politicians.

projects.title: UStA (Independent Student Committee)
projects.description: Active in the UStA since 2021. Organizing the university cinema (weekly film screenings), catering at the AIM career fair, and organizing freshman events.

projects.title: Micromouse Competition
projects.description: Organizing an interdisciplinary Micromouse competition at the university to bring together students from different disciplines (mechatronics, electrical engineering, computer science).

patent.title: Manual Intervention Tracking in Automated Production
patent.description: Originated from the Packaging Valley Makeathon 2020 (Challenge by Syntegon). Idea: Automatic creation of a logbook for manual interventions on machines using camera and object recognition. Syntegon further developed the idea into a patent. I am listed as a co-inventor (25%).

aukom.title: AUKOM 1
aukom.description: Certificate for basic knowledge in industrial metrology. Content: Dimensional tolerancing, programming basics, measurement process planning, and sensor and device technology. Qualifies for reducing measurement uncertainties.

planter.title: Smart Planter
planter.description: A smart flowerpot that gives the user feedback on the plant's condition (water needs, etc.). The goal was to develop a battery-powered IoT device that records sensor data (soil moisture, temperature, humidity, air pressure, brightness), evaluates it, and displays it visually and via a web interface.

projects.title: Hardware & 3D Printing
projects.description: 3D printed housing (PLA) with transparent elements for LEDs. Structure consists of inner pot, outer pot, and saucer (with battery and charging electronics). Connection via Pogo pins.

projects.title: Electronics
projects.description: Self-developed 2-layer PCB with ESP32-C3, VEML3235 (light), BME280 (climate), and capacitive soil moisture sensor (NE555). Power supply via old smartphone battery with TP4056 charging controller and SPX3819 voltage regulator.

projects.title: Firmware
projects.description: Developed with ESP-IDF. Features: WiFi connection (fallback to AP for configuration), sensor reading, LED control, data transmission to backend, deep sleep for power saving.

projects.title: Software Stack
projects.description: Backend: Python (FastAPI), Dockerized. Frontend: Vue.js for visualizing sensor data with GraphJS and firmware updates.

spotivote.title: SpotiVote
spotivote.description: A voting system for Spotify to democratize music selection at events. Guests can search for songs via a web app and vote for them. The song with the most votes is played next.

projects.title: Frontend
projects.description: Vue.js application. Features: Search, voting, display of current playlist. Storing votes in the session.

projects.title: Backend
projects.description: Originally Python, migration to ExpressJS. Spotify OAuth2 Login, playback control via Spotify API. Data storage (votes) in Redis.

board_detection.title: Board Detection
board_detection.description: Software to support hybrid teaching. Automatically detects when a blackboard image is finished, rectifies it perspectively, and saves it. At the end of the lecture, a PDF with all blackboard images is automatically uploaded to the Canvas course.

projects.title: Detection
projects.description: Python with OpenCV. Detection of board areas using Aruco tags. Person detection (Posenet) prevents recording when lecturer is in the image.

projects.title: Processing
projects.description: Perspective rectification, image enhancement (text highlighting), PDF generation, and upload via Canvas API.

ostalb.title: Ostalb Hackathon
ostalb.description: Motto: 'From the region - For the region'. Challenge by Voith: 'Green Production'. The goal was to make production more environmentally friendly.

projects.title: Smart Scheduling
projects.description: Optimizing machine scheduling so that energy-intensive processes run when the own PV system produces a lot of electricity. This minimizes storage losses and CO2 emissions.

projects.title: Prototype
projects.description: Implementation in Python with React frontend. Using weather data for solar power forecast.

packaging_valley.title: Packaging Valley Hackathon
packaging_valley.description: Participation in three consecutive Makeathons of Packaging Valley Germany e.V.

projects.title: 2020: Digital Machine Logbook
projects.description: Automatic recording and categorization of manual interventions on machines using camera and Aruco tags. (Patented)

projects.title: 2021: Vital Signs Monitoring
projects.description: Increasing occupational safety through contactless monitoring of heart and respiratory rate via webcam (OpenCV).

projects.title: 2022: User Authentication
projects.description: Automatic authentication of machine operators using Bluetooth beacons (ESP32) and signal strength evaluation.

smart_green.title: Smart Green Island Makeathon, Gran Canaria
smart_green.description: Challenge to combat plastic waste in open waters.

projects.title: Sensor Buoy
projects.description: Development of a buoy with optical sensors for plastic detection. Power supply via solar cells and supercapacitors (more environmentally friendly than batteries).

projects.title: Data Collection
projects.description: Collaboration with the Aachen Drone Development Initiative. A drone flies autonomously to the buoy and collects the data via LoRa radio connection.

ai_development.title: AI Consulting Services
ai_development.lead: Leveraging the power of Large Language Models (LLMs) and autonomous agents to build next-generation intelligent systems.

llm_integration.title: LLM Integration
llm_integration.desc: Integration of state-of-the-art models like GPT-4, Claude, and Llama into your existing workflows and applications.

ai_agents.title: AI Agents
ai_agents.desc: Conceptualization of autonomous agents capable of planning, reasoning, and executing complex tasks with minimal supervision.

rag_systems.title: RAG Systems
rag_systems.desc: Consulting on building Retrieval-Augmented Generation systems to chat with your private data and documents securely.

process_automation.title: Process Automation
process_automation.desc: Automating cognitive tasks and business processes using intelligent agentic workflows.

three_d_printing.title: 3D Printing Services
three_d_printing.lead: Whether prototypes, small batches, or just small goodies: We got you covered. From rapid prototyping to complex multi-material printing, we bring your ideas to reality.

prototyping.title: Prototyping
prototyping.desc: Fast iteration for your product designs. Send us your files and get your parts quickly.

production.title: Production
production.desc: Small-batch manufacturing with consistent quality. Ideal for end-use parts and functional components.

liability_content.title: Liability for Content
liability_content.p1: We are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws. All content is created with due care and to the best of our knowledge. Insofar as we refer to third-party websites via hyperlinks on our Internet pages, we cannot assume any guarantee for the continuous up-to-dateness, correctness, or completeness of the linked content, as this content lies outside our area of responsibility and we have no influence on its future design. If, from your point of view, any content violates applicable law or appears inappropriate, please let us know.
liability_content.p2: The legal notices on this page as well as all questions and disputes in connection with the design of this website are subject to the laws of the Federal Republic of Germany.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.p1: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution, and any kind of use outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are permitted for private, non-commercial use only.
copyright.p2: Insofar as content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. Third-party content is specifically marked as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please notify us accordingly. Upon becoming aware of any legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.
